about-us-section-1: Welcome to Bijouterie et Joyaux International Inc, a family-owned business and a quality provider of natural gems, specifically Precious & Semi Precious Stones. Driven by an unequalled and genuine passion for Sapphires, specialized knowledge has been passed from father to son for four generations.
about-us-section-2: Our age old establishment having been originally founded by our great grand father Mohamed Ibrahim in the year 1910 in Sri Lanka and handed over to his son Mohamed Saleem ( our grandfather ) in 1945.
about-us-section-3: and there upon had been continued from 1980 by our father, Mohamed Nuhman, Who has been certificated as well qualified in the science of Gemology by the university of Moratuwa, Sri Lanka, in March 2002;
about-us-section-4: And from there the reins of the trade having been handed over by our father, Mohamed Nuhman to us, We two brothers, Mohamed Fazeen and Mohamed Farhan in the year 2010 and named it as BIJOUTERIE ET JOYAUX INTERNATIONAL INC in Montreal, Canada and SERENDIB GEM BUREAU in Sri Lanka.
about-us-section-5: And thus our trade has withstood the test of time spanning a period of over a century and more, continuing uninterruptedly with ever increasing experience and expertise.
about-us-section-6: Sri Lanka, a picturesque island in the Indian Ocean south of India, is the oldest source of sapphires in the World. This country, also known as Ratna-Dweepa (Island of precious stones), is the source of 200 minerals that have been classified as precious stones. Their beauty, durability and rarity combined, make these sophisticated gems in high demand throughout the world. Writings of several traders, dating all the way back to the fourth century attest that they crossed the Indian Ocean to obtain these gems. Even Marco Polo wrote that Sri Lanka Is the source of the most beautiful sapphires in the world.
about-us-section-7: All gemstones in Sri Lanka were formed during pre Cambrian geological age.Therefore, any gem you select is over 800 million years old.
about-us-section-8: Gems have been first recorded in the historical tradition of the island around 500BC. Therefore, Sri Lanka's gem mining industry is one of the oldest of its kind in the world.
about-us-section-9: Sri Lanka gems cover the full range of the colours of the spectrum. Hence you could find a gemstone to suit any mood,any time of the day or season of the year.
about-us-section-10: The Blue Sapphire is Sri Lanka's Gem Supreme. Sri Lanka's Blue Sapphires are the finest in the world. Sapphires of the finest quality have what is called by the experts a corn flower blue or royal blue tint.
about-us-section-11: As Sri Lankans, who are proud of their heritage, and who have grown up in this trade and know it inside out, we can offer our customers excellent quality gems at the best prices because we buy our gems directly at the source. We embrace our responsibility to be in accordance with ethical and humanitarian principles as this business is built by our family.
about-us-section-12: Our goal being to satisfy our customers and professionals, we unearth only the most unique gems, and of the highest quality. Our criteria Is guided by the purity of the gems, therefore, it is with the greatest scrutiny that our sapphires are selected. The sapphires are most often characterized by their deep shining colors and their prices are determined by the 4 Cs (color, cut, clarity and carat).
about-us-section-13: Gemstones being an exhaustible, and non-renewable resource, their worth increases year after year ensuring that investing in gems is a smart investment!
about-us-section-14: We’d love to meet you in person! Please contact us to schedule an appointment and our proficient team members will gladly present you with our outstanding collection of all natural gems each of which are delivered with their certificate of authenticity.
